title: Redeemer Update v1 3-BAT
description:
Battery

bumax[BAFH]

Redeemer v1.3 (c) Good Shepherd Entertainment

Release Date: 11/15/2017 Protection: Steam
Cracked By: BAT-TEAM # of Files: few

Game:

REDEEMER is an intense Brawler where you will punch, hack
and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers
fire arms and even the environment. It grabs the genre by
the throat and drags it into 2017 in brutal style by adding
deep melee combat system and numerous unique types of kills
Redeemer is the brawler for those who love brawlers and have
een waiting for a modern take on the genre!

Play as Vasily, an elite operative who once worked for one of
the biggest Cybernetic Weapons Manufacturers in the world
Officially working in security, you were tasked with infiltration
assassination, extortion and even torture. When eventually the
corporation decided to turn you into one of its cyborg soldiers
ou manage to narrowly escape to a secluded monastery deep in the
nowy mountains

For 20 years you tried to find peace and harmony amongst your
fellow monks, but you are still too haunted by your murderous
ast to find either. Now after all of these years the corporation
is finally closing-in on your location, and in so doing they have
given you one last shot at redemption

Changelog:

Can be found inside the pack!

Required:

Redeemer.v1.2-RELOADED

1. Unpack release
2. Install the Update to where you installed the game
3. Run applyPatch.exe
4. Copy the cracked content from /Crack dir
5. Enjoy! :wink:
